-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                               Movie Description
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Eddy's most ambitious scam ever goes awry, causing all the neighborhood kids to
angrily pursue the Eds as they flee the cul-de-sac. Amidst the chaos, Eddy
searches for the only person who can help them: Eddy's brother.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                 Release Notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The "Ed, Edd n Eddy" TV movie called "Ed, Edd n Eddy's Big Picture Show". This
release is iNTERNAL because of the fact I've messed around with this a lot and
it's re-encoded from an AVI already available on the internet. Also the audio
is only mono (both sources were) and it's also only 44,100Hz, when it would
usually be in stereo 48,000Hz. The recordings are from Cartoon Network
Australia and Cartoon Network Nordic. Also, I kept the movie letterboxed and
didn't crop it to 16:9 because the first two shots are in 4:3; I'm not sure if
they're meant to be like this but this is how they were in the source. No
source in the release name because there are multiple sources. Read below for
details on what I did.

Sources:
1st: "Ed Edd and Eddy's Big Picture Show (divx).avi", 'shadowcanti' YT(?).
2nd: "Ed Edd n Eddy's Big Picture Show - SPOILER - clip of the end", YT
     video by 'spretten', recorded with camera.

Work Done:
1: Took 1st source, fixed sync and cut off credits. Removed CN bumper "blips".
   Cropped unneeded black borders and encoded.
2: Took credits and cropped so it was only them appearing on screen, as source
   had them squashed with no audio. Added audio from 2nd source and encoded.
3: Took AKA Cartoon/Cartoon Network logo at the end, cropped like stage 1 and
   encoded.
4: Put all parts together and encoded like a normal release.

That's about it really! By the way, when this airs in the UK I will have a
better source and I'll release it again, probably then deleting this release.
Also, if you want to read the credits properly, go find the 2nd source.
Shouldn't be hard to find as it IS on;) Enjoy! =D
